pages.text: $(l)$(#ff0000)Forge Energy$(reset) (FE for short) or $(l)$(#ff0000)Redstone Flux$(reset) (RF for short) is the $(l)universal measure of power for modded minecraft$(reset). You might’ve seen many generators and machines from all sorts of tech mods working on the RF power system or some variation of it.

Fear not: mods sometimes use different names (like mekanism’s Joules or Immersive Engineering’s IE), but $(l)they’re all actually running FE under the hood$(reset) with only a few exceptions (Industrialcraft 2’s EU used to be the classic example, but the mod hasn’t been ported beyond 1.12 just yet). Nowadays, pretty much all mods rely on FE/RF, so you can count on that being the universal power system for the pack.
